name: Sonicslingshot
body:
I hacked up this app in a couple of hours for a [CS 476B]() assignment. It generates random tones based on the collisions of these projectiles. Build with [Cocos2D](http://cocos2d.org/).

<iframe width="640" height="360" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/kPDw1QVK4PI" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
